typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		empid as integer,
		empname as string,
		{ dept} as string,
		{ salary} as integer
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 alterRow(deleteIf({ dept}=='HR'),
	updateIf({ dept}=="IT")) ~> AlterRow1
AlterRow1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	input(
		empid as integer,
		empname as string,
		deptid as integer,
		salary as integer
	),
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:true,
	upsertable:false,
	keys:['empid'],
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	mapColumn(
		empid,
		empname,
		deptid = { dept},
		salary = { salary}
	)) ~> sink1
